entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:02 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 05:31 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -10.0°C
Wind: NNE 26 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
